oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Second report of the Board of Health to the Honorable City Council of the City of Nashville, for the year ending July 4, 1877
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An official publication of the City of Nashville, Tennessee, titled “Second Report of the Board of Health to the Honorable City Council of the City of Nashville, for the year ending July 4, 1877.” Forms part of the Publications Collection: Report of the Board of Health of City of Nashville, 1877. 1 book publication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Foster, Wilbur F., 1834-1922; Plunket, J.D.; Nowlin, J.B.W.; Draughon, John A.; Buist, J.R.; Kercheval, Thomas A.; Lindsley, J.
